name: Operation Phantasm
description: A final project from Full Sail University, designed and developed in 4 months by John Hartzell, Jude Joseph, Tyler Fronczack , Alonzo Johnson, with help from Pedro Gonzales (Artist), Mario Garcia (Artist), Chris Rhobyana (Music), Caris Baker (Art Director), and Steven Maslovskiy (Assistant Art Director). Real time tactics game focused on micro of soldiers with limited courage against several enemy types. Inspired by Commandos, X-Com, and Darkest Dungeon. The project is currently in a prototype status and there currently are no plans for full release.
